submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        hsplit = 1
        vsplit = 1
        i = m-2
        j = n-2
        res = 0
        while i >= 0 and j >=0:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                res += horizontalCut[i] * hsplit
                vsplit += 1
                i -= 1
            else:
                res += verticalCut[j] * vsplit
                hsplit += 1
                j -= 1
        while i >= 0:
            res += horizontalCut[i] * hsplit
            i -= 1
        while j >=0:
            res += verticalCut[j] * vsplit
            j-= 1
        return res
